title: Senior Data Associate Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at IFMR in Jan 2021
Interview Descriptions:
There was a total of 5 Rounds, First Intro round then a Written assignment for a coding test, a review interview, and then an HR round.
The test was based on data understanding and presentation skills.
The project lead, data scientist, and HR took it
Interview Questions: Development sector and technology-related questions based on resume

title: Research Scholar Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. I interviewed at IFMR
Interview Descriptions: they covered academic questions about the research proposal, statistics, mathematics, and economics. they asked me in detail about the research proposal and the econometric model used.  the interview was for almost 15 minutes , which is preceded by a written exam.

title: Copywriter (Consultant) Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at IFMR
Interview Descriptions: Very sluggish and terrible interview process. Huge delays in getting back to the candidate. Highly unprofessional. I did not have a good experience. I would suggest that the management should professionalize the hiring process. If not, you will lose out on worthy candidates.
Interview Questions: What's been your past experience in copywriting?

title: Research Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at IFMR (Chennai) in May 2019
Interview Descriptions: The interview was a long-distance one; over phone. That was a good thing as the focus was entirely on the questions asked and the answers given. Consisted of 2 rounds - both were a mix of behavioral as well as technical aspects. Was a standard way of assessing the applicant, getting to know about the breadth and width of knowledge one has with respect to the specific job position applied for. Great experience overall.
Interview Questions: Familiarity with subject matter and intricate questions related to the applicant's understanding of key concepts

title: Research Associate Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at IFMR in Mar 2019
Interview Descriptions: I applied online and was contacted by the HR to set up a telephonic interview. I was interviewed by two researchers. The questions were very technical and somewhat difficult. However, they never informed me if I had been selected, which clearly meant that I hadn't.

title: Research Associate Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. I interviewed at IFMR
Interview Descriptions: Short and specific interview specific to project hired for. Panel interviewed. Friendly and casual. Lasted about 15 minuted. employee referral and CV may have helped gauge the suitablity for role.

title: Credit Assessment Officer Interview
Application Type: I applied through a staffing agency. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at IFMR (Chennai) in Nov 2016
Interview Descriptions: Made me wait for 1 hour. Interview was more on trying to see if I am fit for their requirements. Useless questions about different companies. Question on what type of client I had worked for was the basic premise of the interview. Interviewer was not interested in explaining about their company.
Interview Questions: About The nature of work I do ?

title: Research Manager Interview
Application Type: I applied through other source. The process took 1+ week. I interviewed at IFMR (New Delhi) in May 2015
Interview Descriptions: I worked with one of the affiliates of IFMR. I took a Stata test, then had three (non-technical) interviews, then I was flown in to job location and had another interview.
Interview Questions: Why do you want to take up this role?

title: Intern Interview
Application Type: I applied through college or university. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at IFMR (Mumbai) in Mar 2015
Interview Descriptions: It was a very smooth process with candidates undergoing telephonic interviews. The telephonic interviews didn't last more than 15 mins per candidate. All of the interviews had a tinge of informality which improved the overall experience considerably.

title: Summer Intern Interview
Application Type: I applied through college or university. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at IFMR
Interview Questions: Mostly questions based on resume to see the fit with the role

title: Summer Intern Interview
Application Type: I applied through college or university. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at IFMR (Trichy) in Dec 2012
Interview Descriptions: Campus recruitment, Only one interview. Interview was based on knowledged pocessed over financ and operations.

title: Internal Audits Head Interview

Interview Descriptions: direct round wid the company secretary. basic questions.. v basic only on company law.. got my profile frm naukri.. interview for one hour.. mostly recent amendments on company secretarial practice n basics in internal audit and regulation for banking cos

title: Program Manager Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 months. I interviewed at IFMR (Chennai) in Aug 2011
Interview Descriptions:
The interview is conducted over the phone / skype and focuses on the following key areas:
- Research design
- Analysis of a policy problem
- Past program management work experience

There are multiple rounds of interviews. The first screening interview happens with Research Associates, and subsequently moving up the chain - program managers, executive directors etc.

The interview process is long and not easy, but that's why the brightest and most dedicated people are hired.
Interview Questions: In-depth questions about research design and detailed assessment of understanding about research implementation.
